description: Go green with these crepes full of spinach and other delicious ingredients such as mushrooms, ham and egg. Whip them up for a weekend brunch or weekday lunch.
name: Green Crepes With Ham & Eggs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place extra virgin olive oil, flour, milk, spinach and 1 egg in a blender and blend until smooth and green. Stand for 10 minutes to rest.
Meanwhile, melt butter in a large frying pan over high heat and cook mushrooms for 2 minutes or until just tender. Transfer to a bowl and cover to keep warm.
Crack eggs into same pan and cook for 2 minutes or until whites are set. Transfer to a baking tray and cover to keep warm.

Spray a 23cm non-stick frying pan or crepe pan with oil, then heat over a medium-high heat. Pour 1/3 cup batter into pan, tilting pan to coat the base. Cook for 1 minute or until crepe pulls away from the edge. Top with a little each of the cheese, ham and mushroom. Top with an egg and season. Fold crepe edge into the centre to partially cover filling. Cook for 3 minutes or until cheese has melted. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining batter, cheese, ham, mushroom and eggs to make a total of 6 crepes. Serve crepes scattered with chives.
